mapper.select: select LBNO as lbNo,StuNO as stuNo,StuName as stuName,BookNO as bookNo,BookName as bookName,BorrowTime as borrowTime,LoseTime as loseTime from losebooks where StuName like #{username} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(LBNO) from losebooks where StuName like #{username}
mapper.update: update losebooks set StuNO = #{stuNo},StuName = #{stuName},BookNO = #{bookNo},BookName = #{bookName},BorrowTime = #{borrowTime},LoseTime = #{loseTime} where LBNO = #{lbNo}
delete from losebooks where LBNO in (${value})
